name: chess
description: A free chess website written in Javascript (Node - Express backend & Vue frontend)

scripts.start: npm run client:build && npm run server:start
scripts.install: npm run client:install && npm run server:install
scripts.lint: npm run client:lint && npm run server:lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run client:lint:fix && npm run server:lint:fix

author: Almir Aljic
